main event: A single UFO sighting reported in Texas, appearing as a crescent shape brighter than surrounding stars that descended vertically and moved from left to right below the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 15 minutes., The object appeared brighter than the background stars., The object descended vertically before moving horizontally., No photographs were taken during the sighting., The object was observed under VFR weather conditions.
witness description: A 49-year-old production coordinator, a 43-year-old housewife, and a student.
